message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $120 for this item. Would you consider reducing the price to meet my budget?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $145.
